text: I am making Thai fresh spring rolls
today with the Oh Lewis suin Lewis one
means sort of venturing into the garden
let's work on the filling first I am
using tuna today canned tuna I'm just
gonna season it some oyster sauce a
little bit of olive oil just to
lubricate it if your tuna comes packed
in oil you do not need to add this some
black pepper small dice onion just to
give it a little bite give it a little
taste just a little dash of soy sauce I
actually want to make this with no
noodles because that's the wake with the
Oh Lewis one is in Thailand cucumber
which are actually mini cucumber
julienne carrots both of these I
actually blanched in some salt water
help make the rolls moist and not too
dry tomato that I julienne I took out
all the seeds some alfalfa sprouts you
can use broccoli sprouts or you can just
use finely shredded lettuce this rice
paper here got some warm water here and
by warm I mean as warm as you can handle
so as soon as it's pliable like this you
can take it off
hi basil I could use Thai basil and mint
if I wanted to the important thing is to
make it tight so that when you cut it
doesn't fall apart this is the best part
of quite Theo Lewin the sauce some
garlic lots and lots of cilantro now you
can do a combination of cilantro and
mint lots of fresh lime juice fish sauce
of course some spicy Thai chilies I like
to add a little bit of honey there you
go mmm whoo that smells like Thailand
nice the reveal trim it off just a
little bit there you go so not too much
you
